alert.note: Alert for Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 8:33PM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Soundside areas along the Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Ocracoke Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.9 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 PM 3.1 2.0 2.6 3 Minor 18/08 AM 3.0 1.9 1.8 2 Minor 18/07 PM 2.3 1.2 1.5 1 None 19/08 AM 2.5 1.4 1.3 1 None 19/09 PM 2.0 0.9 1.2 1 None 20/09 AM 2.3 1.2 1.2 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
